results.title: Simvastatin preserves cardiac function in genetically determined cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: Five-month-old @<m>DISEASE_LEOPARD_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044542 @@@cardiomyopathic@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_LEOPARD_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044542 @@@CM@@@) @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@ were divided into 2 groups: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ (20 mg/kg, 6 weeks, n = 6) and Untreated (n = 6).

citations.NLM: Abraham SS, Osorio JC, Homma S, Wang J, Thaker HM, Liao JK, Mital S. Simvastatin preserves cardiac function in genetically determined cardiomyopathy. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2004 Mar;43(3):454-61. PMID: 15076231
